text:
Mudar Mohammad Ayesh Badran () (born 1934) is a former Jordanian politician and government minister, and starting 1993, a Jordanian industrialist mainly in steel manufacturing. He served as Prime Minister of Jordan from 1976 to 1979, again from 1980 1984 and again from 1989 to 1991.
Badran was born in Jerash, Jordan in 1934.
